name: Appleberries
description:
Don't let the apples be on the ground! Collect the apples and put them in the crate. For each apple and touching the ground, per second, the score counter increases by one.

When the score reaches 60 it is game over.

Controls:
A/D or Arrow Left/Arrow Right - Move left right.

Mouse left click - Throw held apple in direction of the mouse pointer.

My contribution for HedgeJam #4 with theme "Fruits galore".

Software used:
Godot Game Engine
Krita
Aseprite
Chiptone
